name: 创建报警文件夹

labels.name: story
labels.value: 接口名称：创建报警文件夹

parameters.name: caseinfo
parameters.value: {'name': '创建报警文件夹', 'base_url': '${get_base_url(base_url)}', 'request': {'url': '/api/v1/alarmfolder/add', 'method': 'post', 'json': {'name': '报警文件夹${get_random_number(1,1000)}', 'nodeType': 0}, 'headers': {'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8', 'X-Project': '${get_extract_data(x_project)}'}}, 'extract': {'Alarm_Folder_ID': 'id'}, 'validate': [{'equals': {'status_code': 200}}, {'equals': {'nodeType': 0}}, {'contains': 'id'}]}

parameterValues: {'name': '创建报警文件夹', 'base_url': '${get_base_url(base_url)}', 'request': {'url': '/api/v1/alarmfolder/add', 'method': 'post', 'json': {'name': '报警文件夹${get_random_number(1,1000)}', 'nodeType': 0}, 'headers': {'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8', 'X-Project': '${get_extract_data(x_project)}'}}, 'extract': {'Alarm_Folder_ID': 'id'}, 'validate': [{'equals': {'status_code': 200}}, {'equals': {'nodeType': 0}}, {'contains': 'id'}]}
